name: adhesin prediction tools
short_description: This project provides users with standalone version of adhesin prediction tools- SPAAN: a software program for prediction of adhesins and adhesin-like proteins, MAAP: Malarial adhesin and adhesin-like proteins predictor and FungalRV adhesin predictor. The individual readme with each software contains the detailed instructions of software installation and usage procedures. These softwares are artificial intelligence based non-homology methods developed to aid identification of novel adhesins and adhesin-like proteins.
summary: Standalone version of adhesin prediction tools
